LanguageData.Wort.label: wort
LanguageData.Wort.description: Beer before fermentation. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable beer.
LanguageData.Beer.label: beer
LanguageData.Beer.description: The first beverage besides water ever consumed by mankind. Beer can taste good, but its main effect is intoxication. Excessive consumption can lead to alcohol addiction.
